title: How can you win against mundo
body:
Lately after the patch ive been noticing LOTS of people playing Mundo, and for some reason theyve all won their games. I was up against one, and he was just outright unbalanced with the new masteries.  His q is really annoying and with the "heal every 4 whatever" mastery he doesnt ever lose health, as soon as I burst him to half way he just regains it all with his cleaver shit, I also beat a mundo with riven one other game but as soon as late game started he could 1v5 and no one could do anything about it? Even the new items dont seem to work against him...
anyways people pls teach me and not scold me for being a noob because im still learning bout the game. 
:^-)

Get Mortal Reminder.

Step one pick Jayce. There is no step two.

But seriously just find a champ that your ok with that does well against him early. My personal favorite is Jayce but I would recommend trying trundle. Another strat would be to pick someone that can impact the rest of the map early and still do ok vs him in lane like Lissandra. Also vayne adc gives 0 f's about mundo.
